column5: A young felllow that I use to work with is looking for part time work in the Guelph area.  He is a third year University of Guelph student working towards obtaining his Bachelor of Arts degree with certificates in both Business and Leadership.  He is a bright young man, and a hard worker, it would be nice to help him if we can. If anyone has an opening or knows of an opening, please email me [emailÂ protected] and I will have him forward his resume!
